summary: AN ORDINANCE amending the Seattle Business Tax Ordinance, Seattle Municipal Code Chapter 5.44 (Ordinance 72630), by amending SMC S 5.44.140 (Ordinance 72630 S 13) to authorize annual returns based on current year's estimates; amendng SMC S 5.44.180 (Ordinance 72630 S 17) to change the due date and penalty; and adding a new section authorizing fees for copying and research.
